Package algorithms.util

Class CorrespondencePlotter

  • java.lang.Object
    • algorithms.util.CorrespondencePlotter
  • public class CorrespondencePlotter
extends java.lang.Object
    a helper class to visualize correspondence lists. An instance contains the transformations for the two difference datasets to place them in the output image reference frame.
    Author:
    nichole
